item.description:
Greeting Canadians!

For the April Meetup we will be taking in the very popular MFA First Friday.

Join me in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and a delicious tapas menu. Relax and unwind in a beautiful setting with friends both old and new.

April 1, 2011
5:30 pm - 9:30 pm

Gallery 250

Music: The Kevin Harris Jazz Trio

Cost: Regular Museum admission

I will arrive at the gallery at 6 pm, and will head up stairs after paying admission and checking my coat to grab a brewskie. You can find me upstairs in the main hall, or you can call me on my cell at 857-221-2041.  You can arrive early if you wish, and bring whomever you wish. Afterward for those interested we will head back into town to keep the party going!

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-first-fridays
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the Koch Gallery, small canuck flag

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: MFA First Friday!
